messages.subject: very sorry for repetitive deadlines
messages.msgSnippet: I m so sorry to have posted that over and over!  Eeep! (So was I my own digest?  VERY very sorry, if so.) Marty s about to leave to go to the gaming shop.
messages.messageBody:
I'm so sorry to have posted that over and over! Eeep!

(So was I my own digest? VERY very sorry, if so.)

Marty's about to leave to go to the gaming shop. Kirby is at work (there).
Holly is at the park nearby playing with friends on the still-new playground
equipment. I'm all alone in a minute. Woohoo!!! I think I'll go rent a
chick-flick DVD and fold laundry. (Big day for me. LOL! but at 4:30 it's
drive Holly to fiddle, then Holly to another class, then go play music at
Jeff's house... it's a small window.)

Sandra
